com.hazelcast.map.impl.querycache.subscriber

Interface SubscriberContextSupport

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientSubscriberContextSupport, NodeSubscriberContextSupport

    public interface SubscriberContextSupport
    Contains various helpers for SubscriberContext.

    • Method Summary

      Creates recovery operation for event loss cases.

    • Method Detail

      • createRecoveryOperation

        Object createRecoveryOperation(String mapName,
                               String cacheId,
                               long sequence,
                               int partitionId)
        Creates recovery operation for event loss cases.
        Parameters:
        mapName - map name
        cacheId - ID of cache
        sequence - sequence to be set
        partitionId - partitions ID of broken sequence
        Returns:
        operation or request according to context
        See Also:
        QueryCache.tryRecover()

        Returns:
        resolved response
